Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Instructions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageInterface
    the interface implemented by all the instructions, used to implement the visitor pattern
    MessageVisitor
    interface implemented by the messages handler, implements the visitor pattern
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AskForReloadStateNotification
    ask the player if he wants to reload a previous game and return to the server his answer
    BuildNotification
    notify to the client a build move done by a player
    ChooseCardListNotification
    lets the first player choose all the card that will be in the game
    ChooseCardNotification
    lets the player choose a card
    ChoosePosNotification
    lets the player choose the position of the move / build
    ChooseWorkerNotification
    lets the player choose which worker he wants to play with
    DisconnectionNotification
    notify the disconnection of one client, the game end
    EliminationNotification  
    FirstPositioningNotification
    lets the player choose where he wants to position his workers in the first turn
    LoadGameNotification
    contains all the informations that allow the client to reload a saved game
    MoveNotification
    notify to the player a move performed by another client
    SetNameNotification
    allows the player to set the name
    SetPowerNotification
    allows the player activate the power of his card
    WinNotification
